data.name: Paint the Town Red Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
The Paint the Town Red Original Soundtrack includes 32 songs from the game. It's two hours of multi genre music, remastered for this release.

Credits:
Music composed and produced by Jeff van Dyck
Mastered by Matthew Gray Mastering
Album Art by Shane Carr
Game Concept by Matthew Carr and Shane Carr

Minimum:
  • Storage: 486 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 1670 MB available space
